page.title: 04HUDDERSFIELD INDUSTRY
page.content: Huddersfield is an industrial town in the Heavy Woollen District of West Yorkshire. There are many industries in our area. Large, small, engineering, textiles, gears, sports gear,but the main area is along the valley of the River Colne. The valley has the canal, railway and the main Leeds Road, there is much old industry in this area. The whole area is changing. We saw the large mill being knocked down, and when we asked a worker he said the whole area had been demolished, including the Cooling Towers which were blown-up. The Gasworks is still there and a mill and a very large engineering works. One or two new factories have opened. They are only one storey high and very clean looking. .
